short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Open a list of Jira IDs

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Use this tool to open jira tabs by first setting a root url for your jira site like (https://projects.companyname.com/browse/) and then copying and pasting a list of Jira ID's into the popup text area with line breaks between each one.

Jira Tab
